1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.Comment
4  ( Texts (..),
5    CommentDoc (..),
6    CommentSec (..),
7    emacsModeComment,
8    commentLine,
9    putCommentLines, hPutCommentLines,
10  ) where
11
12import qualified System.IO as IO
13
14-- | Something that can become a string list.
15class Texts a where
16    texts :: a -> [String]
17
18-- | Simple document in comment.
19--
20--   >>> texts $ CommentDoc [CommentSec "SAMPLE" ["This is a sample section."]]
21--   [ "**"
22--   , "**  SAMPLE"
23--   , "**    This is a sample section."
24--   , "**"
25--   ]
26--
27data CommentDoc =
28    CommentDoc [CommentSec]
29    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
30
31instance Texts CommentDoc where
32    texts (CommentDoc ss) =
33        let ls = "" : concatMap texts ss
34        in map (prepend "**" "  ") ls
35
36-- | Section title and its contents.
37data CommentSec =
38    CommentSec String [String]
39    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
40
41instance Texts CommentSec where
42    texts (CommentSec title xs) =
43        title : map (prepend "" "  ") (xs ++ [""])
44
45prepend :: [a] -> [a] -> [a] -> [a]
46prepend a _ [] = a
47prepend a b xs = a ++ b ++ xs
48
49emacsModeComment :: String
50emacsModeComment = "** -*- koshu -*-"
51
52commentLine :: String -> String
53commentLine "" = "**"
54commentLine s  = "**  " ++ s
55
56putCommentLines :: [String] -> IO ()
57putCommentLines = putStr . unlines . map commentLine
58
59hPutCommentLines :: IO.Handle -> [String] -> IO ()
60hPutCommentLines h = IO.hPutStr h . unlines . map commentLine
